charts.deltaDesc: Cumulative time gap throughout the lap
charts.trackDominanceDesc: Real GPS circuit layout with speed advantage gradient

gpsNotAvailable.title: GPS DATA NOT AVAILABLE
gpsNotAvailable.desc: Track Dominance Map requires GPS coordinates from telemetry data. This feature is only available for races from 2018 onwards.
gpsNotAvailable.hint: Try selecting a more recent Grand Prix (2018+) to view the circuit dominance analysis.

rateLimit.title: Limit reached
rateLimit.message: You've reached the limit of 12 requests per day.
rateLimit.upgrade: Upgrade to METRIK+ for unlimited requests!

anatomy.title: F1 ANATOMY
anatomy.subtitle: Interactive 3D Car ‚Ä¢ 12 Components ‚Ä¢ CFD Simulation
anatomy.info: üñ±Ô∏è Rotate ‚Ä¢ üîç Zoom ‚Ä¢ üéØ Hotspots ‚Ä¢ üåä CFD ‚Ä¢ ‚ö° DRS ‚Ä¢ üí• Exploded View

cfd.title: CFD Wind Tunnel
cfd.desc: Animated flow lines showing real aerodynamics. Wing, ground effect, and DRS impact visible.

drs.title: Active DRS
drs.desc: The wing opens progressively. Visible impact on airflow (reduced turbulence).

wheels.title: Realistic Wheels
wheels.desc: All 4 wheels rotate on the spot with detailed rims and spokes.

exploded.title: Exploded View
exploded.desc: Each component moves precisely away from its axis to see inside.

laminar.title: Laminar Flow
laminar.desc: Blue lines show airflow. The front wing splits the flow, air accelerates under the floor (Venturi effect), and the rear wing creates downforce while generating turbulence.

drsImpact.title: DRS Impact
drsImpact.desc: DRS closed: Large rear turbulence creating high drag. DRS open: Smooth flow, drag reduced by 20-30%, speed gain of 10-15 km/h on straights. Only usable in races under conditions.

groundEffect.title: Ground Effect
groundEffect.desc: Flow lines descend under the car and accelerate (Venturi). Creates 40-45% of total downforce. Critical ride height of 5-10mm from ground. 2022 regulations reintroduced this effect to improve racing.

hybrid.title: Hybrid System
hybrid.desc: The MGU-K recovers energy during braking (up to 2 MJ per lap) and redeploys it for 160hp extra for a maximum of 33 seconds per lap. The MGU-H recovers energy from the turbo with no time limit.

tyres.title: Tyre Management
tyres.desc: 5 Pirelli compounds (C0-C5). Optimal window: 100-110¬∞C. Crucial strategy with thermal management, degradation and graining. Teams must use at least 2 different compounds in the race.

electronics.title: Onboard Electronics
electronics.desc: Over 300 sensors on the car. Real-time data transmission to the pits. Analysis of brake temperature, tyre pressure, wear, fuel consumption, and engine parameters to optimize strategy.

frontWing.name: Front Wing
frontWing.desc: Generates 25-30% of total aerodynamic downforce. Composed of 5 adjustable elements to optimize aerodynamic balance. The design directly influences airflow to the rest of the car.

rearWing.name: Rear Wing + DRS
rearWing.desc: Mobile wing with DRS (Drag Reduction System). Opens to reduce aerodynamic drag and gain 10-15 km/h on straights. Electronically controlled from the cockpit.

cockpit.name: Cockpit + Halo
cockpit.desc: Titanium protection introduced in 2018. The Halo withstands 12 tonnes of force and has already saved several lives. The cockpit integrates all vital controls accessible to the driver.

wheels.name: Wheels (x4)
wheels.desc: 18-inch Pirelli tyres with magnesium rims. Teams can change all 4 wheels in under 2 seconds during a pit stop. Optimal temperature is crucial for performance.

sidepods.name: Sidepods
sidepods.desc: Crucial aerodynamic elements that cool the engine via 4 radiators. Their design also creates the Venturi effect that generates downforce. Major innovation area between teams.

floor.name: Floor
floor.desc: Surface that generates ground effect. Responsible for 40-45% of total downforce thanks to Venturi created under the car. Ride height is critical (5-10mm from ground).

engine.name: V6 Hybrid Engine
engine.desc: Hybrid power unit combining a 1.6L Turbo V6 with two energy recovery systems (MGU-K and MGU-H). Develops around 1000 horsepower total with record 50% thermal efficiency.

suspension.name: Suspension
suspension.desc: Ultra-sophisticated push-rod/pull-rod system that maintains the car at optimal ride height. Continuously adjustable to adapt to fuel level and tyre wear.

gearbox.name: Gearbox
gearbox.desc: 8-speed sequential transmission + reverse. Gear changes occur in less than 50 milliseconds via steering wheel paddles. Load-bearing carbon structure.

steering.name: Steering Wheel
steering.desc: Control center with over 25 buttons and settings. The driver controls braking, differential, ERS, radio, drinks and strategy from the wheel. Cost: ~‚Ç¨50,000.

battery.name: ES Battery
battery.desc: 4 MJ Energy Store system. Powers the MGU-K which delivers 160 extra horsepower for a maximum of 33 seconds per lap.

diffuser.name: Diffuser
diffuser.desc: Rear aerodynamic element that accelerates airflow exiting under the car. Creates suction effect that pins the car to the ground. Complex design with multiple channels.
